scripts.deploy-cbers: npm run clean && CATALOG_URL=https://cbers-stac-0-6.s3.amazonaws.com/catalog.json npm run build && bin/prerender.js -p https://cbers-stac.netlify.com https://cbers-stac.s3.amazonaws.com/catalog.json && netlify deploy --prod --dir dist/ --site d51680e6-45e1-49db-b1e4-eb6e236a431a
scripts.deploy-iserv: npm run clean && CATALOG_URL=https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/radiant-nasa-iserv/iserv.json npm run build && bin/prerender.js -p https://iserv-stac.netlify.com https://s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/radiant-nasa-iserv/iserv.json && netlify deploy --prod --dir dist/ --site 7ad829b5-58b2-4a72-9e42-eb5749982070
scripts.deploy-planet: npm run clean && CATALOG_URL=https://storage.googleapis.com/pdd-stac/disasters/catalog.json npm run build && bin/prerender.js -p https://planet.stac.cloud https://storage.googleapis.com/pdd-stac/disasters/catalog.json && netlify deploy --prod --dir dist/ --site 0208c719-dcdf-42dc-bddb-9ae5498424db && curl http://www.google.com/ping?sitemap=https://planet.stac.cloud/sitemap.txt
scripts.deploy-boundless: npm run clean && CATALOG_URL=http://stac.boundlessgeo.io/stac npm run build && netlify deploy --prod --dir dist/ --site 95a54956-1c9b-4548-87bc-a7ce834f980b
scripts.deploy-prerendered: npm run clean && npm run build && bin/prerender.js -p $STAC_URL $CATALOG_URL && netlify deploy --prod --dir dist/ --site $NETLIFY_SITE_ID
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && npm run build && netlify deploy --prod --dir dist/ --site $NETLIFY_SITE_ID
